Package org.fest.swing.script

Allows execution of Abbot (actually, Costello) scripts without JUnit 3.8 (for example, with JUnit 4 or TestNG.)

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ScriptApprover Understands approval or rejection of execution of a given script file.
 

Class Summary
FileNameMatchScriptApprover Understands a ScriptApprover that approves a file only if its name is in a list of approved files.
ScriptAssert Understands assert methods related to execution of Abbot test scripts.
ScriptRunner Understands how to run one or more Abbot scripts.
 

Exception Summary
ScriptFailure Understands a wrapper for Throwables thrown while running an Abbot script.
 

Package org.fest.swing.script Description

Allows execution of Abbot (actually, Costello) scripts without JUnit 3.8 (for example, with JUnit 4 or TestNG.)

Example: 


public class SomeScriptsTest {

  @Test public void shouldExecuteScripts() {
    ScriptRunner runner = new ScriptRunner("c:\\scriptFolder");
    runner.runScripts();
  }
  
}
